about_the_game:
Synthetic Soul 2 is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After taking over as CEO of Davis Industries, creator of the Greydoll robots, you must build your new Corporation from the ground up.

Raising in power means having new outfits and personality modules for your robot, buying Real Estate, and Commercial Real Estate.

Earn money daily from upgrading your Corporation, day stock trading, or Real Estate Income.

What kind of person will you become once you rise to the top?

Discover the wealth of Industry and change everything.

content_descriptors.notes:
It's only started by the player only, no sexual acts or done without the player start them.

Including handjobs, missionary, thighjob, cowgirl, boobjob position at present.

There is no actions of extreme violence, graphic sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm, within the game.

Synthetic Soul 2 is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After taking over as CEO of Davis Industries, creator of the Greydoll robots, you must build your new Corporation from the ground up.

Raising in power means having new outfits and personality modules for your robot, buying Real Estate, and Commercial Real Estate.

name: Synthetic Soul 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows8.1, Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Able to run 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Synthetic Soul 2 is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the wealth of Industry and change everything.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
